name: AD WARS 56KBPS
description:
A global game jam game from 2019 made by me and my team.
The game is asymmetric multiplayer 1 vs 1 game. 
Player 1 playing as the "user" that want to go to the home page.
Player 2 playing as the "spammer" that need to spam player 1 with ads.

The win condition for player 1 is to press the home button 4 times.
The win condition for player 2 is to survive n seconds (20 by defaults) without letting Player 1 press the home button.  

Credits:

Jonathan Levin - Programming, game design and super cool self made ads (watch for the corn hub ads).

Yevgeny Blinov - Sound and video design.

Idan Lev  - Graphic designer.
